GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/1.description: serves an array of one article, corresponding to the article_id e.g. article_id = 1

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/1/comments.description: serves an array of zero or more comments related to a specific article, the article corresponds to the article_id e.g. article_id = 1

comments.body: This morning, I showered for nine minutes.
comments.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/1/comments.description: serves an array of a single comment, posted to a specific article, the article corresponds to the article_id e.g. article_id = 1

PATCH /api/articles/1.description: serves an array of a single article, which has the votes property updated, the article corresponds to the article_id e.g. article_id = 1
